code that i used

}
if (npcs[i].npcType == 50)
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) //this is the time delay

npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn(“lunatrix”))
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “lunatrix is online”;
}
else
{
npcs[i].textUpdate = “lunatrix is offline”;
